response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I believe it could significantly contribute to your endeavors or personal satisfaction. I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special price of $900,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in its potential impact on your life. I trust that you will find this proposal both attractive and fair. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 900000}
